primary.context: Caller wanted to discuss billing but requested a human immediately.
primary.detail: The caller was placed in a queue that eventually timed out, and they declined the AI's offer to help after the failed transfer.

steps: AI offered to connect and asked for the department.
AI placed caller in a concierge queue for approximately 20 minutes.
Queue timed out with a message that no representatives were available.
AI re-engaged to offer automated billing help; caller declined and hung up.

actions.detail: Transfer to billing/concierge timed out after 20 minutes.

insights.summary: The caller requested the billing department immediately. After a 20-minute hold in the concierge queue, the AI informed the caller no one was available and offered automated help, which the caller declined.
insights.verbatim: Actually, there isn't a representative available to take your call right now. I can help with your billing request, or you can call back during our work hours.
insights.coaching: The AI performed correctly by attempting the transfer and offering a fallback when the queue failed; the long wait time is a staffing/queue management issue rather than an AI logic failure.
